Package io.atlasmap.core

Class AtlasMappingHandler

java.lang.Object
io.atlasmap.core.AtlasMappingHandler
public class AtlasMappingHandler extends Object
The API for handling AtlasMapping which represents the AtlasMap Mapping Definition. TODO Migrate AtlasMapping handling to this, mostly from DefaultAtlasContext, and possibly from io.atlasmap.service.MappingService

    • removeDocumentReference

      public void removeDocumentReference(DocumentKey docKey)
      Removes all references to the specified Document in the mapping definition. It removes the DataSource entry as well as the mappings that refer to the Document.
      Parameters:
      docKey - the identifier of the Document to be removed

    • setDataSource

      public void setDataSource(DocumentKey docKey, DataSource dataSource)
      Sets the DataSource. It updates if there is an existing DataSource identified by the Document ID and DataSourceType, otherwise adds a new entry.
      Parameters:
      docKey - DocumentKey
      dataSource - DataSource

    • getDataSource

      public DataSource getDataSource(DocumentKey docKey)
      Gets the existing DataSource identified by the DocumentKey.
      Parameters:
      docKey - DocumentKey
      Returns:
      DataSource if found, or null
